mapper.select:
--1. 월관리 + 부가수익의 금년 매출액, 누적 미수금, 금년 입금금액 select sum(conCost) as con_cost , sum(outCost) as out_cost , sum(depositCost)as deposit_cost from ( select coalesce(sum(aa.quote_cost), 0) + coalesce(sum(aa.surtax), 0) as conCost --금년 매출액 , coalesce(sum(aa.quote_cost), 0) + coalesce(sum(aa.surtax), 0) - coalesce(sum(aa.deposit_cost), 0) as outCost --금년 미수금 , coalesce(sum(aa.deposit_cost), 0) as depositCost --금년 입금금액 from web.adjust_add aa where 1=1 and extract('YEAR' from aa.deposit_dt) = extract('YEAR' from now())
union all
select coalesce(sum(bb.con_cost), 0)+coalesce(sum(bb.surtax), 0)+coalesce(sum(amm.add_cost), 0) as conCost ,coalesce(sum(bb.con_cost), 0) + coalesce(sum(bb.surtax), 0) + coalesce(sum(amm.add_cost), 0) - coalesce(sum(amm.deposit_cost), 0) as outCost --계약금+부가세+추가금-입금 = 미수금 ,coalesce(sum(amm.deposit_cost), 0) as depositCost -- 금년 입금금액 from web.adjust_mt_manage amm left join web.bldg_bas bb on amm.bldg_cd = bb.bldg_cd where 1=1 and extract('YEAR' from deposit_dt) = extract('YEAR' from now()) ) as a

--2. 금년 매출비율 (전체 매출에 대한 월관리, 부가수익 비중) --getStatisticsTotalPercent
select round(sum(ammCost) / sum(conCost)*100, 0) as amm_percent, round((sum(aaCost) / sum(conCost))*100, 0) as aa_percent from ( select coalesce(sum(aa.quote_cost), 0) + coalesce(sum(aa.surtax), 0) as conCost --금년 매출액 , 0 as ammCost , coalesce(sum(aa.quote_cost), 0) + coalesce(sum(aa.surtax), 0) as aaCost from web.adjust_add aa where 1=1 and extract('YEAR' from aa.deposit_dt) = extract('YEAR' from now())
union all
select coalesce(sum(bb.con_cost), 0)+coalesce(sum(bb.surtax), 0)+coalesce(sum(amm.add_cost), 0) as conCost , coalesce(sum(bb.con_cost), 0)+coalesce(sum(bb.surtax), 0)+coalesce(sum(amm.add_cost), 0) as ammCost , 0 as aaCostfrom from web.adjust_mt_manage amm left join web.bldg_bas bb on amm.bldg_cd = bb.bldg_cd where 1=1 and extract('YEAR' from deposit_dt) = extract('YEAR' from now()) ) as a

--3. 월관리, 부가수익 매출액 3개월분 --getStatisticsTotal3Month
select mon_mt, sum(conCost) as con_cost from ( select to_char(aa.add_dt, 'YYYY-MM') as mon_mt, coalesce(sum(aa.quote_cost), 0) + coalesce(sum(aa.surtax), 0) as conCost --금년 매출액 from web.adjust_add aa where 1=1 and extract('YEAR' from aa.deposit_dt) = extract('YEAR' from now()) group by to_char(aa.add_dt, 'YYYY-MM')
union all
select mon_mt as mon_mt, coalesce(sum(amm.con_cost), 0)+coalesce(sum(amm.surtax), 0)+coalesce(sum(amm.add_cost), 0) as conCost from web.adjust_mt_manage amm where 1=1 and extract('YEAR' from deposit_dt) = extract('YEAR' from now()) group by amm.mon_mt ) as a group by mon_mt order by mon_mt desc limit 3

--4. 금년 월관리 매출액, 부가수익 매출액 --getStatisticsTotalCost
select '부가수익' as type, coalesce(sum(aa.quote_cost), 0) + coalesce(sum(aa.surtax), 0) as con_cost --금년 매출액 from web.adjust_add aa where 1=1 and extract('YEAR' from aa.deposit_dt) = extract('YEAR' from now())
union all
select '월관리' as type, coalesce(sum(bb.con_cost), 0)+coalesce(sum(bb.surtax), 0)+coalesce(sum(amm.add_cost), 0) as conCost from web.adjust_mt_manage amm left join web.bldg_bas bb on amm.bldg_cd = bb.bldg_cd where 1=1 and extract('YEAR' from deposit_dt) = extract('YEAR' from now())

--5. 부가수익 세부 분류별 매출액 --getStatisticsAddSubCost
select aa.classifi_nm, coalesce(sum(aa.quote_cost), 0) + coalesce(sum(aa.surtax), 0) as conCost --금년 매출액 from web.adjust_add aa where 1=1 and extract('YEAR' from aa.deposit_dt) = extract('YEAR' from now()) group by aa.classifi_cd, aa.classifi_nm
